Name: Caracoland
About the game: Caracoland is a unique platform game where the player can walk on different shapes of terrain and climb walls defying gravity, uniting the modern features with classic elements from the past. The game also features an innovative power-up system, with which the player can change shells to acquire different attributes and interact with the objects in different ways, making items and platforms accessible. This makes the game very challenging, requiring skills and intellect from the player. Features: - Leaderboards (integrated with the Rosasoft Server) - 30 challenging achievements - Unlockable new secret game mode - A store to buy power-ups with coins collected in the game - More than 100 levels to play (including the new game mode)
